text: What makes life worth living Hi everyone After thinking about it for a bit  I ve come to the conclusion that I have literally nothing to live for  The prospect of living my whole life without doing anything that I m passionate about  or anything of real value  is much more terrifying than just offing myself  I don t even have any real problems  but there s barely anything that makes me even remotely happy nowadays  I know that I can be happy  because I was for most of my life  But nowadays  I just don t have the will to keep on going  I didn t go through a tough breakup  or lose a family member  or anything like that  it just came out of nowhere  Why should I keep on living if it s so much easier not to   sorry for the rant y ness of this post

text: I m not creativeSo last week I found out my ex was cheating on me  When I confronted him he dumped me and I had to move back home with my parents  They were supportive with me grieving and everything  But I m still not over it and it s just propelled me deeper into my depression and I ve starting cutting myself again  Everyone expects me to get over it and I m just not  He was the only guy I ve ever loved and we lasted a year  As of right now I m fully blown suicidal and today I looked at guns to buy  It will either be me shooting myself in the head or cutting my wrists  I ve stopped eating and lost over twenty pounds  This relationship ending really just pushed me forward with suicidal thoughts and self harm  I haven t cut in over a year and I finally succumbed to it a few days ago  I go to work where I see him being unaffected by everything  laughing and joking around  Then there s just me  Endless suffering and feeling so isolated   I have been reaching out to supports and I see a therapist  I m also medicated as well  None of that helps me  I just feel like this is my only option right now  I ve got nothing else  My house is shit  my life is shit  The only thing I enjoyed was seeing the new joker movie where I only liked it because I related so hard to him  But even in that movie he ends up on top  Me  That just won t happen  I guess this is it
